Description:
THE PERFECT FAMILY HOME
CLYDE NORTH - RAMLEGH SPRINGS: Situated in a quiet yet very much sought-after location is this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to secure this beautifully constructed home in Ramlegh Springs. Built by Metricon, the vendors have spared nothing in providing absolutely all the comforts one would want in a home of this caliber.
With a family friendly floor-plan and so much on offer, you will be spoiled for choice the moment you walk through the front door of this home. A grand facade to greet you on arrival, this home has been impeccably built with a lot of consideration to family living.
Sitting proudly on 448 square meters, you will surely be thrilled to call this home. The master bedroom comes with a full ensuite, a walk-in robe, double vanities as well a double-sized shower. The remaining bedrooms are spacious and come with huge built-in robes.
The central focal point of this home would have to be the kitchen, this is where it all happens. Caesar stone bench tops, tiled splash back, walk-in pantry, are just some of the highlights of this kitchen, not to miss the quality kitchen appliances on offer, all of this over-looking the open plan dining and living area.
If entertaining is what you'd like to indulge in then the huge alfresco would surely be a hit, with well manicured gardens at the back and a fully fenced backyard to keep those kids and pets safe. In addition, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, high ceilings, are just some of the extras this home has on offer.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
DISCLAIMERS:
Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, however it does not constitute any representation by the vendor, agent or agency.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
Due to private buyer inspections, the status of the sale may change prior to pending Open Homes. As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.
ADDED INTERNAL/EXTERNAL FEATURES INCLUDE:
- Built in 2017 - METRICON HOMES
- Open Plan Living
- Open Plan Dining
- Formal Living/Theatre
- Study Nook
- Master FES/WIR
- Double Vanities
- Double-sized shower
- 900mm cooktop
- 900mm oven
- Microwave oven
- Dishwasher
- Walk-in pantry
- Laundry room
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative Cooling
- Solar Panel - Hot Water
- Alfresco
- High Ceilings
- Down lights
- Side Access
- Garden Shed
Internal area
186m²

Description:
Available Now For Private Inspections!
Sitting in a prime location, within the popular Delaray Estate, is this quality designer-built home that embraces all aspects of lifestyle, specked up for family living and friendly entertaining. Surrounded by parklands, this perfect family home is ready for you to move in and to call it your own.
Beyond the eye-catching and modern facade lies the approx. 28 squares of magnificently executed finishes and display home quality fittings, with ample garage for two vehicles and/or additional trailers, vans and larger sized vehicles. Included within is an impeccable master suite with his and her robes, vanity and shower located away from the master are three additional bedrooms all with BIR's.
Special to this home is the outstanding theatre/rumpus room that is ready for you to plug and play, relax and watch the footy or a Rocky marathon...whichever you desire. The open plan design offers a stunning functional kitchen that leads through the triple stacked sliders to the ultimate alfresco entertaining area. Whether you're celebrating a mate's birthday or simply hosting a family BBQ, the outdoor area makes it easy with upgraded Blackbutt hardwood flooring, gas built in BBQ and outdoor power supply that makes everyone want to come back to 18 Deoro Parade.
Extra inclusions within the property that serve for the ultimate comfort include the Toshiba Refrigerated Cycle Cassette System and double-glazed windows, which ensures cool nights are warm and warm nights are cool.
For the buyer that craves perfection and quality, all whilst being situated in one of the most sought-after positions within Clyde, this home must be inspected today.

Description:
Brand New Modern sleek Home !!!
**PLEASE CALL FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION**
A blissfully quiet locale provides the ideal setting for this single-level sensation delivering a lifestyle of easy living in the thriving suburb of Clyde North. With immaculate presentation, spacious interiors and an array of upgraded fixtures and fittings throughout, this sophisticated family home is bound to impress anyone who inspect it.
Modern, fresh and light filled interior, a front master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe & ensuite with double vanity, three more bedrooms with built-in robes, a main bathroom, a formal lounge, an open plan expansive living/dining finished with well appointed kitchen which includes 900mm stainless steel five burner cooktop & oven, 40mm stone bench top and walk-in pantry.
Your new home comes with following inclusions
- LED Downlights throughout the house
- Floor boards to hallway, lounge, living, dining and kitchen
- Quality carpets to bedrooms
- 900mm Five burner cook top and oven
- Stone benchtops throughout the house
- 40mm Stone benchtop to kitchen
- Glass splash-back
- Pendant lights to kitchen
- Walk in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Remote double lockup garage with internal access to house
Your new home is in walking distance to
- future supermarket, medical centre, gym, restaurant and cafes
and Short drive to
- Bunnings on Clyde
- Future Berwick town centre
- Hillcrest College
- Rivercrest Christian College
- Avenue Shopping Centre
- Grayling Primary School
- St Francis Xavier College (Berwick Campus)
- Berwick Chase Primary School
- Catherines Catholic Primary School
- Tulliallan Primary School
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre
- M1 Freeway access (Inbound and outbound)
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 or Dilshan 0402 696 602to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
PARK FACING... DREAM HOUSE IN IDEAL LOCATION!
CLYDE NORTH, SELANDRA RISE ESTATE: A perfect and much awaited opportunity knocks at the door of the first home buyers, investors, and families out there Ideal location, enviable dwelling and easy on the pocket too!
This beautiful family home facing Hilltop Park, offering exercise equipment and childrens park, has all the features that an ideal modern home must offer . Boasting 4 Spacious bedrooms, including Master with full ensuite and a Walk-in Robe. The other bedrooms are very spacious and have Built in Robes. The two separate living areas in the house are perfect for family time and entertaining with the large stacker doors open out to the alfresco area. Plenty of space for everyone!
The kitchen is sure to impress any chef with Stone benchtop, top quality appliances, ample cabinet storage and microwave space. Easy to clean timber floorboards, remote-controlled double garage with internal access and low maintenance gardens with a large alfresco, great for entertaining and much more.
Min Features of the Property:
- 4 Bedrooms
- Master with Full Ensuite and WIR
- His and Her Vanity to Ensuite
- 2 Living Areas
- His and Her Vanity to Ensuite
- Full Stacker Doors to Alfresco
- Block out Blinds
- Stone Bench Tops
- NBN Connection
- Double Garage Internal Access
- Electric Paneled Door
- Outdoor Entertainment Area
- Heating: Yes
- Cooling: Yes
- Down Lights: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 days.
Ideal location of this home gives you access to
- Hilltop Park
- Selandra Rise Shopping Centre
- Casey Fields sporting grounds
- Casey RACE
- Cranbourne Library
- Clyde Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
- Bus stops
- Multiple Parks (Tennis Courts & Children parks)
- Cranbourne Railway station
- Wilandra Rise Primary School
- St Thomas Apostle Primary School
- St Peter's College
- Selandra Rise Primary School
- Clyde Tennis Club
- Kingswim& YMCA
This property wont last long in the market, So dont miss out this opportunity, Give Hardeep Singh a call on 0406 676 197 today to book an inspection time.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES

Address: Lot 705/230S Hardys Road Clyde North VIC 3978
Description:
Neatly Positioned
One of a few neatly positioned blocks in this boutique estate that won't last long - with access to public transport such as extensive bus services and walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre and train station, plus access to major arterial roads, including the M1 freeway and South Gippsland Highway
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs, a unique residential development with substantial integrated parklands and conveniently located in one of Melbourne's most rapidly growing areas. Offering an abundance of opportunities for you and your family to create a bright and prosperous future.
Lifestyle
Surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland and within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse and Library, and an easy half hour drive to the beach.
Education
Ideally located close to a range of well regarded schools and institutions; Chisholm Institute, Federation University Campus, Hillsmeade Primary, St. Catherine's Catholic Primary, St. Francis Xavier College, Heritage College, Alkira Secondary College, St. Margarets School and Haileybury College.
Shopping
Clyde Springs enjoys an abundance of shopping centres close by, including Centro Cranbourne, Fountain Gate, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and Eden Rise Shopping Centre, with a new centre proposed on Hardy Road.
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs Mountain views, parkland, recycled water for lush green gardens and amazing amenities close by.

Description:
Family Home with Views & Versatility
On approximately 400sqm overlooking the picturesque Clyde Wetlands, this modern four bedroom home demands your attention. Located in the Cascades on Clyde Estate, it offers a well-considered floorplan incorporating plenty of family living and entertaining space. Awash with natural light, the ground floor instantly impresses with a formal lounge, separate open-plan living/dining and a fabulous covered alfresco. Each of these areas is expertly serviced by an immaculate kitchen boasting stone bench tops and high quality S/S appliances. All four bedrooms are ideally located upstairs; the master enjoys a twin vanity ensuite, walk-in robe and stunning parkland views, while the remaining bedrooms include built-in robes and share a chic main bathroom with separate WC. Creature comforts are aplenty with ducted heating and evaporative cooling featured throughout. Theres also a full-sized laundry, guest powder room and a remote double garage with convenient internal access. Perfect for a large or growing family, all this is within easy walking distance of Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, bus stops and a fantastic selection of primary and secondary schools.
***PhilipWebb Real Estate Coronavirus Update***
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority. Please note the following changes to our open for inspection processes as we navigate the current Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation.
Inspections are strictly by appointment only. Please register your contact details to arrange a private inspection with the listing agent
Attendees are limited to one agent and one prospective purchaser, who may be accompanied by one other person (either an existing household member or intimate partner) and their children under 18 years old if there are no appropriate alternative care arrangements available
Please maintain safe social distancing of 1.5m from anyone in attendance including PhilipWebb staff
Face masks must be worn at all times
Avoid touching surfaces including fittings and fixtures within the property
Hand sanitiser is provided
We kindly ask that you refrain from attending an inspection if you:
Are experiencing flu-like symptoms
Have tested positive to, or have recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
Have recently travelled overseas or have been in direct contact with someone who has
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Address: Lot 733/230S Hardys Road Clyde North VIC 3978
Description:
Located in quiet no-through lane - Clyde Springs
Perfect spot in quite no through lane to build your dream home - Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs, a unique residential development with substantial integrated parklands and conveniently located in one of Melbourne's most rapidly growing areas. Offering an abundance of opportunities for you and your family to create a bright and prosperous future.
Access to public transport such as extensive bus services and walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre and train station, plus access to major arterial roads, including the M1 freeway and South Gippsland Highway
Lifestyle
Surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland and within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse and Library, and an easy half hour drive to the beach.
Education
Ideally located close to a range of well regarded schools and institutions; Chisholm Institute, Federation University Campus, Hillsmeade Primary, St. Catherine's Catholic Primary, St. Francis Xavier College, Heritage College, Alkira Secondary College, St. Margarets School and Haileybury College.
Shopping
Clyde Springs enjoys an abundance of shopping centres close by, including Centro Cranbourne, Fountain Gate, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and Eden Rise Shopping Centre, with a new centre proposed on Hardy Road.
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs Mountain views, parkland, recycled water for lush green gardens and amazing amenities close by.

Description:
Brand new bordering Berwick Ready to move in!!!
**PLEASE CALL FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION**
An exciting opportunity to secure this wonderful custom designed House that offers comfort and space, Ready to Move in Now!!!
This home with high ceilings offers professionally landscaped front and backyards, four generous bedrooms, master featuring walk in robe and lavish ensuite, remaining three bedroom with wardrobes, separate bathroom and toilet, a formal lounge, spacious open plan living, dining finished with well appointed kitchen fitted with 900mm five burner cooktop, oven and ragehood, dishwasher, stone benchtops and large walk in pantry.
For your convenience, this home comes with
Coloured concrete to driveway
Fencing
Front and back landscaping
Clothesline
Letterbox
LED downlights to living areas
NBN ready
Holland blinds
Tiles to Wet areas, Kitchen, Meals, Living & Pantry & Rear Hallway
Carpet floor coverings to the balance of the home
2590mm ceiling heights
900mm Rangehood & Cooktop Appliances to Kitchen
600mm stainless oven & dishwasher
Remote Control Sectional Garage Door
Flyscreens to all openable windows and flywire to selected doors
Premium 3 coat paint system to walls
Tiled shower bases to Ensuite & Bathroom
Your new home in 2020 is located in short drive to
- Hillcrest College
- Rivercrest Christian schools
- Grayling Primary School (public school)
- Future Berwick Waters Town centre
- Future state primary and secondary school
- Cardinia Creek
- Casey hospital
- Casey central shopping centre
- Eden rise village shopping centre
- Berwick & Beaconsfield railway station
- Monash Freeway Access
- Berwick Chase Primary School.
- Kambrya College
- St Francis Xavier College, Beaconsfield Campus
- Berwick College
Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 or Madhawa Hewawasam on 0426 659 974 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
State of the Art Living!
Built to the highest quality by multiple award winning builder Porter Davis, the moment you arrive at this home you will be drawn in by the elegance and grace, no expense has been spared offering the highest quality fixtures and fittings in a dream location.
Stepping inside you'll find laminate timber flooring flowing through the home, a front study and front formal living area are just the start of this spacious family home. The hub of downstairs is the open plan living integrating kitchen - dining - lounge into one. A naturally light filled kitchen offers stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including oven, cook top, rangehood and dishwasher. There is plenty of cupboard space and walk in pantry.
Walking up the timber stairs with glass railing will give you the feeling of entering a five star hotel, once at the top you'll find a third living zone with plenty of space for a big couch and large TV. The oversized master bedroom offers walk in robe plus ensuite, bedroom two features a walk in robe, whilst bedrooms three and four both have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom.
Other internal features include downstairs powder room, internal access from the double plus extra car garage on remote which also offers a rear access roller door to the backyard, internal laundry, evaporative cooling, ducted heating plus high quality fixtures and fittings.
Enjoy the private surrounds of your outside entertaining area with the under roof space covering the timber decking, a low maintenance garden compliments a busy lifestyle.
Situated in the highly sought after Cicra estate, enjoy the best of what Clyde North and Berwick has to offer with close proximity to prestigious schools, Casey Central & Eden Rise shopping centres, public transport, medical and sporting facilities. All the hard work has been done with a high quality finish in a great location, don't miss your chance to take this opportunity!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised. If you prefer to view by Private Inspection please click the 'Book Inspection' button to register your preferred inspection or contact the agent to organize a suitable time. The health and safety of our clients and staff is paramount and we are closely following the advice of the Australian Government and World Health Organisation.

Description:
476m2 Block In St Germain Titling September 2020!
Don't wait 6 to 12 months for land to title as this 476m2 block is located in the popular St Germain estate and is due to title in September 2020! Dimensions are as follows: 15m frontage, 32m left depth, 15m rear depth and 32m right depth. With landscaped gardens, picnic facilities, places to meet and enjoy the company of friends and family - St Germain also features a major supermarket, retail stores, childcare, gym, cafes and restaurants. Whether nesting or investing, here lies an opportunity to buy your very own piece of land that's nearly ready to be built on.

Description:
Family Gem in Selandra Rise!
UpHill Real Estate is delighted to present this well loved family home in Selandra Rise Estate (named Victorias best master-planned development 2016 UDIA Awards for Excellence), and in walking distance to St Thomas primary school, St Peters Secondary College, Wilandra Rise primary school , Clyde Shopping centre, multiple parks, childcare centres, bus-stops and Selandra rise shopping centre.
Light and bright interior comprising a master bedroom to front of the home with Walk-in robe & classy private ensuite, two more bedroom with wardrobes, a main bathroom, an open plan family & dining area perfected by well-appointed designer Kitchen which includes 900mm stainless steel five burner cooktop & oven, stone benchtops and walk-in pantry. Step out through one of the two elegant wooden stacker doors to find a covered decked alfresco with spacious backyard that welcomes young explorers and all year BBQ
Your new home comes with,
- Elegant floating boards throughout
- Ceiling fan to master bedroom
- Ducted Heating & Split system cooling
- Glass splash-back in kitchen
- Five burner 900mm stainless steel cooktop and oven
- Dishwasher
- Stone Benchtops to Kitchen
- walk-in pantry
- Garage with remote control panel lift garage door with internal & external access
Your new home is located walking distance from
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Two children parks & walking tracks
- Bus stops (route 798)
- Selandra Rise Shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Medical Centre, AMCAL pharmacy, restaurants)
- Clyde shopping centre (McDonalds, Coles, Restaurants, Pharmacy, Medical centre, MyCar Auto)
- St Peters Secondary College
- St Thomas the Apostle primary school
- Waterfront
- Eclipse Childcare centre
and a short drive from
- Cranbourne East Primary School
- Cranbourne East Secondary School
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne Railway Station
- Berwick town centre
- Monash Freeway (Inbound and outbound)
- Hunt Club
- KingSwim aquatic centre
- Casey Fields
- Casey Grammar School
- Cranbourne Library
- Marnebek School
- St Catherines Catholic Primary School
- St Francis Xavier College
- Hillcrests Christian College
- Rivercrest Christian College
and many more conveniences
Would you like to flow through this beautiful home at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer? Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 to schedule a private inspection
Insights: 20 FLEUVE RISE, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.
